casebody.data:
James J. Gearns, Administrator, Appellant v. The Bowery Savings Bank, Respondent. Decided May 4, 1891. Appeal by plaintiff from judgment entered on verdict for defendant. Titus & Dowling, for appellant. Norwood & Coggeshall, for *588respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and McAdam, J.

Per Curiam.

On account of a division of opinion of the judges the judgment is affirmed, with costs.
